name: Depth of Pipe Below Water Table:
3. Allow pressure to settle for 12 hours
4. Re-apply and maintain test pressure for 5 hours by successively pumping a sufficient amount of water
5. Measure water volume required to maintain pressure between Hour 2 and Hour 3 -  V1
6. Measure water volume required to maintain pressure between Hour 4 and Hour 5 -  V2
D1 = nominal diameter of pipe size #1, (m)
D2 = nominal diameter of pipe size #2, (m)
D3 = nominal diameter of pipe size #3, (m)
H = average test head of pipeline, (m)
Test Time || Time of Day || Reading (m3)
The test length shall be acceptable where:
1. No failure of any thrust block, pipe, fitting, joint or any pipeline component
Attach Test Section Sketch (show heights, air valves, gauges and filling points)
Checked and Signed by Site Engineer
